section.title: Sequential
section.para: The sequential container executes the embedded test actions in strict sequence. Readers now might search for the difference to the normal action chain that is specified inside the test case. The power of sequential containers will unfold in combination with other containers like iterations and parallelism. We will see this later when handling these containers.
For now the sequential container seems very unspectacular - one might say boring - because it simply groups a pair of test actions to sequential execution.
